thread.title: Body found in search for missing Deakon Wilkins
thread.title_full: Body found in search for missing Deakon Wilkins | West Country - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Body found in search for missing Deakon Wilkins
text:
A body, thought to be that of missing Deakon Wilkins, has been found in Bristol's Floating Harbour.
Police say they were called at midday to the bridge at Oxford St.
There have been extensive searches for Deakon. Credit: ITV West Country Deakon, 24, from Weston-super-Mare was last seen at Motion Nightclub on 14th January.
Formal identification has yet to take place, but his father Andy posted the following on his facebook site:
Sorry, this content isn't available on your device.
We were called at about midday to reports of man’s body in the Floating Harbour under the bridge in Oxford Street.
The body has been recovered from the water and although formal identification has not yet taken place, the family of missing man Deacon Wilkins have been advised.
– Avon and Somerset Police Last updated Mon 6 Feb 2017 Bristol
